long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No matter how secure a system may be, sooner or later it will be hacked. This could be due to bugs, poor security policies, weak algorithms, brute hacking, human error or rogue employees. But we have a guaranteed solution! 

ePin is an authentication identity provider based on OpenID Connect that fundamentally solves bulk username/email and password hacking. It is designed such that even if the database of identification is knowingly or unknowingly stolen - you are fine. It is always self-corrected and auto-updated.
